#summary View levels or floors that are above or below your character
#labels Featured

= How To Use =

Level Spy is a tray icon application with a popup menu and two sets of hotkeys. Use the menu or hotkeys while in-game to turn features on or off. You can turn the sets of hotkeys on or off to suit your preference.

= Features =

  * Level Spy
  * Name Spy
  * Show Invisible Creatures
  * Full Light
